channel.title: Accessing redash from a local dekstop browser
channel.description:
Hi,
I need help with accessing redash web console from my local browser where redash is running on a remote server(azure ubuntu vm).
redash is running with http:0.0.0.0/5000 but system ip is 172.168.12.34. 1.How can i change ip adress from 0.0.0.0 to 172.168.12.34
Im very new to redash and any help really helps me!. Thanks in advance.
Rajesh
